startLocation.description: Place de la République, Paris, France
startLocation.address: Place de la République, 75011 Paris, France

name: High in the City of Love
summary: Our premier walking tour of Paris's 420-friendly scene
description: Welcome to Paris THC Tours! We take you on a 2.5 hour walking tour through the most beautiful city in the world…on THC edibles. Our tour starts at Place de la Republique with a short stroll to our favorite cannabis boutique, where we will supply each tour participant with 50 milligrams of THC edibles. From there, we embark on a journey through the City of Light, with stops at historic locations such as Notre Dame cathedral, the Louvre, Tuileries Gardens, Place de la Concorde, as well as some favorite local hangout spots such as Canal Saint-Martin and Les Halles. This English tour provides you an opportunity to take in the beauty of Paris with a guide who knows all the best spots to enjoy your high. If you’re tired of the same old walking tour and looking for a unique way to experience this historic city alongside like-minded people, this is the tour for you!
